name: Video Poker Elite - Free
description:
Get 'FREE FOUR GAMES IN ONE' in Video Poker – Elite, the new offering from our ‘Elite’ series of exciting casino games.

The game features the video poker variations like –
★Jacks or Better
★Double Bonus
★Deuces Wild
★Double Double Bonus

The game is fun and easy to learn and is made even simpler by our step by step playing instructions, easy access of the standard rules and detailed payout tables

You just have to place a bet, select the best cards to hold and expect to get the maximum payout possible

The realistic game play combined with the statistics reports for the played hands will definitely help any player to analyze and form winning strategies for the next visit to the casino

Extra fun – you get to choose 4 different table tops and 8 card designs to make the game play experience more appealing.

Features:
★Four popular video poker games in one
★Simple one-tap controls and an intuitive use interface for ease of play
★Gorgeous graphics
★Comprehensive statistical report
★Detailed step by step playing instructions, rules and payout tables
★Distinctively designed cards for a unique experience
★Auto save facility
★Universal app! Enjoy on all iOS devices
